tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting (XSS) if the `unsafe-inline` rule is used in the content-security-policy (CSP) meta tag. The `unsafe-inline` keyword undermines most of the security benefits provided by CSP. It was required in order to enable certain functionality of the package.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version of this package <= 19.4.1 and 'unsafe-inline' is used in the content-security-policy meta tag.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `ngx-extended-pdf-viewer` library to the patch version.
